title: Stage Lv4-A5-S20
description: Level 4 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: The service has been successfully completed. (business variant 1)
I hope you were satisfied. (business variant 1)
learning_points: Level 4 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: The service has been successfully completed. (business variant 1)
I hope you were satisfied. (business variant 1)
Please contact us again anytime. (business variant 1)
We would like to maintain a good relationship. (business variant 1)
We would appreciate your recommendation. (business variant 1)
Was your service experience good? (business variant 1)

sentences.kr: 향후 기회가 있다면 함께 일하고 싶습니다. (비즈니스 1)
sentences.en: We would like to work together if there are future opportunities. (business variant 1)
Your feedback would be helpful. (business variant 1)
It has been a pleasure working with you. (business variant 1)
We will assist you whenever you need it. (business variant 1)
The service has been successfully completed. (business variant 2)
I hope you were satisfied. (business variant 2)
Please contact us again anytime. (business variant 2)

We would appreciate your recommendation. (business variant 2)
Was your service experience good? (business variant 2)
